textBeforeTable: League Position 2014-2015 Ed Harrison I'm very pleased about that! I had another battery of medical tests early last week, and the results show my PSA count as undetectable, which means the prostate cancer is still under control, and there is no trace of cancer in the body. Health Update – 4 Feb, 2015 St. James' Park Borussia Mönchengladbach Sat 1st August (3:00 pm) Bootham Crescent York City Wed 29th July (7:45 pm) D 2-2 Bramall Lane Sheffield United Sun 26th July (1:00 pm) L 4-3 Providence Park, Portland Portland Timbers Tue 21st July (7.30 pm PT - 3:30 am Wed Newcastle time) W 1-0 Bonney Field, Sacramento Sacramento Republic Sat 18th July (8:00 pm PT - 4:00 am Sun Newcastle time) L 2-1 Miller Park, Milwaukee Club Atlas Tue 14th July (8:00 pm CT - 2:00 am Wed Newcastle time) W 1-0
textAfterTable: Fantasy League Thanks to reader Lewis Spiers, who has kindly set up the Fantasy League for our readers. The code is 157085-73868 and readers can set up the league here. Follow Us In Honor of John Alder and Liam Sweeney John Alder and Liam Sweeney In honor of two dedicated Newcastle fans, who lost their lives supporting Newcastle United, when their passenger jet was shot down over Ukraine on Thursday July 17th, 2014 by rebels, as they were traveling to support the team in New Zealand. We will never forget them. Tore Eikeland Foundation Tore Eikeland
